===== Location Name ===== 
{{for revison 1.02}}

==== Example Usage ====

The name of the location being used can be declared as such:

<code xml>
<name>Ivory Coast</name>
</code>
It is also good practice to declare this name in the language of the country where the project is being implemented, particularly if this differs from the default language of the activity:

<code xml>

</code>
